original: ji skad du /

analyzed: dad pa'i chu klung dri med byas pa yid kyis ni //

original: rang gi lag nas dus su gzhan la gnod med par //

analyzed: mtshan nyid kun rdzogs yon tan ldan zhes thub rnams gsung // zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: sems pa'i khyad par gang gis sbyin pa dang / des bcu pa don yongs su gtong ba ni sbyin pa'o ;

original: / de ni rang gi don la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
analyzed: / de ni rang gi don la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
translated: That is the reason for one‚Äôs own aim, etc.

original: de yang zang zing dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang zang zing dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //

original: dang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: dang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba yin no //

original: mchod 'os ni mchod par 'os pas te /
analyzed: mchod 'os ni mchod par 'os pas te /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'o //

original: de rnams mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams mchod pa ste /
translated: are those worthy of worship.üîΩWorship is of two kinds,

analyzed: de yang zang zing dang / sgrub pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so //

original: byams pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsam pa 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / lan du phan 'dogs su re ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsam pa 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / lan du phan 'dogs su re ba spangs pa'o //

analyzed: chos ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid do //

original: gdung ba lnga la sogs pas kyang lus gdung bar byed pa'i phyir gzhan nas chos su bshad pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: 'di ltar lus gdung ba de ni 'ba' zhig pas ni gzhan la gnod pa ste gnod par byed pa spong bar byed cing ldog pa yang med la /

original: gzhan dag la phan 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag la phan 'dogs pa ste /

original: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i bye brag gis phan pa nye bar bsgrub pa yang yod pa ma yin pas gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid kyi chos ni kho bos gnyis kyi mtshan nyid can bshad pa gang yin pa 'di kho na yin no //

analyzed: sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: lus dang sems bsil bar byed pa'i phyir spong ba bdun gyi mtshan nyid kyi don ni tshul khrims so //

analyzed: brnab sems med pa la sogs pa ni 'di nyid du 'dus te /

original: bcu pa spangs par gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: bcu pa spangs par gsungs pa ni //

original: sems can blun pos khong du chud par bya ba'i don du zad do //
analyzed: sems can blun pos khong du chud par bya ba'i don du zad do //

analyzed: bzod pa ni khro ba bzod pa'o //

analyzed: sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba ni sa lnga pa'o //

original: rjes su mthun pa ni sa gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa ni sa gnyis pa la'o //

original: yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: yang rnam pa gsum ste /

original: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dag ni sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dag ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dag ni sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dag ste /

original: dang zhes bya ba'i don ni ba gnyis pa yin pas ba gnyis pa'i tshig bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: dang zhes bya ba'i don ni ba gnyis pa yin pas ba gnyis pa'i tshig bsdu ba yin no //

analyzed: de dag gi mtshan nyid gsal ba ni shin tu gsal zhing thibs po ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: dam pa bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos so //

analyzed: yang na nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bzang po yin no //

analyzed: 'di ni lam yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na lam po che'o //

original: gang gis 'di chen po nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis 'di chen po nyid yin zhe na /

analyzed: grangs las 'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i phyir ro //

original: yang na chen po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam yin la /
analyzed: yang na chen po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam yin la /

analyzed: de dag @132b gi tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan che ba'i phyir che ba nyid do //

original: dam pa'i chos nyid lam po che yin no //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos nyid lam po che yin no //

original: 'di la lam dang chos mthun pa nyid gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la lam dang chos mthun pa nyid gang yin zhe na /

analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin pa'o //

translated: Those who, through delusion, disrespect, disregard, and despise that highway of the holy Dharma, thinking that it is not the Dharma, abandon it and go elsewhere.

analyzed: gang dag tu zhe na /

analyzed: gnag gi lam lta bu'i lam gol ba dag tu'o //

analyzed: gnag rnams kyi lam ste lam gol ba'i ngo bo dag go //

original: de dag tu ste 'di skad du bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag tu ste 'di skad du bshad pa yin no //

original: dper na gnag gi khyu nas gnag gtso bo lam gol ba gang du 'gro ba der gzhan dag kyang rung ba dang yang ba yongs su mi shes pas 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du mu stegs can phyugs 'di dag kyang /

analyzed: chos kyi lam lam gus nas chos ma yin pa'i lam lam gol ba'i ngo bo lus gdung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar pa'i bsam pas 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no // de gang du 'jug cing /
translated: The path of Dharma is the path of Dharma, and the path of non-Dharma is the path of non-Dharma. The essence of the path of non-Dharma is to go with the intention of tormenting the body and so on, which is characterized by wandering in the suffering of cyclic existence.üîΩWhere does it enter?

original: gnas gang du 'gro zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang du 'gro zhe na /

original: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par ro //

original: 'khor ba ni 'khor bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba ni 'khor bar 'gyur ba ste /

original: phung po'i tshogs 'gro ba gzhan nas 'gro ba gzhan du phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phung po'i tshogs 'gro ba gzhan nas 'gro ba gzhan du phyin pa'o //

original: 'khor ba zhes bya ba de las gzhan ni yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'khor ba zhes bya ba de las gzhan ni yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: There is nothing other than cyclic existence.

original: phung po de dag nyid 'khor bas na de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: phung po de dag nyid 'khor bas na de skad ces bya ste /
translated: It is called that because those aggregates cycle.

original: dper na bya rog gi nag po dang / chu skyar gyi dkar po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bya rog gi nag po dang / chu skyar gyi dkar po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying the blackness of a crow and the whiteness of a heron.

original: de nyid 'brog yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'brog yin te /
translated: That itself is a wilderness.

analyzed: bya dang / ri dags dang / rtsva dang shing gis gang zhing skyes bu dam pas spangs pa'i yul la ni 'brog ces bya'o //

analyzed: de yang mi dge ba'i grogs po bya dang / ri dags dang / rtsva dang / shing lta bus gang zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba yin no //

analyzed: 'brog de ni sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mang ba'i phyir mi bzad cing bgrod dka' ba yin no //

original: mtha' yas skye bo'i shing can du //
analyzed: mtha' yas skye bo'i shing can du //
translated: It is filled with the trees of the infinite multitudes.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos mthun pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos mthun pa ston pa yin no //
translated: This shows the similarity.

original: de dag ni skye bo yang yin la mtha' yas pa yang yin @133a * //üîΩpas zhes tshig bsdu ste /
analyzed: de dag ni skye bo yang yin la mtha' yas pa yang yin @133a * // pas zhes tshig bsdu ste /
translated: The multitudes are both multitudes and infinite, so they are summarized as infinite multitudes.

original: grangs dang tshad dag gis mtha' mi zin pas mtha' yas pa'o //
analyzed: grangs dang tshad dag gis mtha' mi zin pas mtha' yas pa'o //
translated: They are infinite because their number and size are limitless.

original: gang la shing de dag nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la shing de dag nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called that because it is filled with those very trees.

original: dam pa'i chos dang bral zhing lta ba ngan pa'i thibs por lhung ba de gang dag dang gnas par gyur pa de dag ni shing lta bu yin te /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos dang bral zhing lta ba ngan pa'i thibs por lhung ba de gang dag dang gnas par gyur pa de dag ni shing lta bu yin te /
translated: Those who live there are like trees, because they are devoid of the true Dharma and have fallen into the thicket of wrong views.

original: dam pa'i chos sems pa dang bral bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos sems pa dang bral bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is devoid of the contemplation of the true Dharma.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud nyon mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud nyon mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs zhes bya'o //

original: de dag nyid gnod par byed pa'i phyir gdug pa'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid gnod par byed pa'i phyir gdug pa'o //
translated: They are also called poisons because they are harmful.

original: de dag gi lus 'khyud pa ni 'khyud pa'i lus te /
analyzed: de dag gi lus 'khyud pa ni 'khyud pa'i lus te /
translated: The body that is embraced by them is the embraced body.

original: nyon mongs dang nye ba'i nyon mongs par rang dbang med pas shin tu yun ring du zhes bya ba mtha' med par 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: nyon mongs dang nye ba'i nyon mongs par rang dbang med pas shin tu yun ring du zhes bya ba mtha' med par 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
translated: One enters into them and engages in them for a very long time, i.e., endlessly, because one is not their master due to the root and secondary afflictions.

original: rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩmi gsod pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // mi gsod pa dang zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: byams pa zhes bya ba'i bar ldog pa dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos mdor bshad pa gang yin pa de'i mi mthun pa ni phyogs gsod pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni mi 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ;

analyzed: de la mtshon la sogs pas gcod cing lus la gnod pa ste gnod pa yang yin la mang po yang yin zhes bya bar tshig bsdu'o //

analyzed: rku ba ni ma byin par len pa ste /

analyzed: de kun du bsten nas longs spyod kyis phongs so //

analyzed: spyad par bya bas na longs spyod de /

original: nor dang 'bru la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nor dang 'bru la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: dgra dang @133b bcas par 'dug pas na dgra dang bcas pa ste /

analyzed: ji ltar 'dis gzhan la dgra nyid byas pa de bzhin du 'di la yang 'byung bas rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin no //

analyzed: de ltar lus kyi nyes pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bshad nas / brdzun du smra bas skur pa ste //

analyzed: skur pa ni yang dag pa'i don rjod pa chud gson pa'o //

original: gang gis der 'gyur zhe na brdzun du smra ba ste /
analyzed: gang gis der 'gyur zhe na brdzun du smra ba ste /

analyzed: phra mas ni gzhan dbye ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig smra bas te /

analyzed: des ni phan par 'dod pa'i bshes dang 'bye zhing 'bral bar 'gyur ro //

original: mi snyan pa ni mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: mi snyan pa ni mi mthun pa'o //

original: de thos pa ni grag pa'o //
analyzed: de thos pa ni grag pa'o //

original: ma 'brel pa ni tshig kyal pa ste des so //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa ni tshig kyal pa ste des so //

original: mi btsun pa ni mi 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: mi btsun pa ni mi 'dod pa ste /

original: de tsam ni ngag gi nyes pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de tsam ni ngag gi nyes pa'i 'bras bu yin no //

original: brnab sems yid la re ba 'joms //
analyzed: brnab sems yid la re ba 'joms //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yid kyi nyes pa'i 'bras bu bshad do //

analyzed: yid kyis bsams shing mngon par 'dod pa'i don de don med cing 'bras bu med par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: 'jigs pa ster bas na 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa ster bas na 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //

original: bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //

original: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa med pa'i rnam pa can gyi lta ba ni log par lta ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa med pa'i rnam pa can gyi lta ba ni log par lta ba ste /

original: de ni lta ba ngan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni lta ba ngan pa nyid do //

original: smad pa'i lta ba ni lta ba ngan pa ste /
analyzed: smad pa'i lta ba ni lta ba ngan pa ste /

original: lta ba log pa yin no //
analyzed: lta ba log pa yin no //

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni lta ba ngan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni lta ba ngan pa nyid do //

original: de thob par 'gyur te /üîΩyang log par lta ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de thob par 'gyur te / yang log par lta ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: blo 'khrul pa ni smyon pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //

original: ma byin len pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: ma byin len pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni dbul ba nyid do // tshul 'chos pa la sogs pa'i @134a * //

analyzed: skyon gyis bsgrubs pa'i 'tsho ba ni log par 'tsho ba ste /

analyzed: bshad pa'i don las zlog pas 'tsho ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de kun du bsten pas na bslus pa ste 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //

analyzed: khengs pa yis zhes bya ba ni mchod gnas mchod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //

analyzed: khengs pa ni gyong zhing 'gying ba ste brjid 'chos pa'i nga rgyal gyis zin pa'o //

original: gang gis der 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis der 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: bsgrags pa gang yin pa ni bshad pa gang yin pa ste / gsod pa yis ni tshe thung 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes bya ba nas ; mkhas la mi 'dri blun pa nyid //

analyzed: de ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa dag bstan pa mdzad nas /

original: gti mug ni mi shes pa'o //

analyzed: 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa ni 'di dang gzhan du mdog shin tu mi bzad par 'gyur la /

analyzed: 'o na mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i lhag ma yin no //
translated: What is the characteristic of nirvana? This is the remainder of the explanation.

original: 'dzin pa ni reg pa ste de dag gis ma reg cing yul du ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni reg pa ste de dag gis ma reg cing yul du ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is not touched by the six sense faculties, nor is it an object of the six sense faculties.

original: de zad pa ni 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: de zad pa ni 'gog pa ste /
translated: Its extinction is cessation.

original: so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: It has the characteristic of cessation not due to discrimination.

original: gal te rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes smra na med par lta ba la brten par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes smra na med par lta ba la brten par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that nirvana does not exist in any way, you will be grounded in the view of nihilism.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not have that characteristic.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is its characteristic?

original: mjug thogs kyi tshigs su bcad pas de ston te /
analyzed: mjug thogs kyi tshigs su bcad pas de ston te /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that.

original: mdor bsdu na mtshan nyid 'di yin no //
analyzed: mdor bsdu na mtshan nyid 'di yin no //
translated: In brief, this is its characteristic.

original: rgyas par bya na ni bde ba dang / dkon mchog dang / las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang bsam gtan la sogs pa med do zhes lta ba ni med par lta ba ste /
analyzed: rgyas par bya na ni bde ba dang / dkon mchog dang / las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang bsam gtan la sogs pa med do zhes lta ba ni med par lta ba ste /
translated: is the view of negation.

original: 'bras bu ni mi 'dod pa yin pas de'i phyir yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni mi 'dod pa yin pas de'i phyir yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Since its result is undesirable, it is to be completely rejected.

original: bsod nams ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu ston te /
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu ston te /
translated: The result of that is shown by the words ‚Äúnon-merit, etc.‚Äù

original: ngan song rnams las srung zhing skyob pas na bsod nams so //
analyzed: ngan song rnams las srung zhing skyob pas na bsod nams so //
translated: It is merit because it protects and saves from the miserable realms.

original: de lta bu ma yin pas na bsod nams ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin pas na bsod nams ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is non-merit because it is not like that.

original: rang gi ngo bo ngan song gi rgyu mtshan yin pas na ngan song ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ngan song gi rgyu mtshan yin pas na ngan song ba'o //
translated: It is a miserable realm because it is the cause of the miserable realms.

original: yang nang na song du 'byung ba yin pas na ngan song ba'o //
analyzed: yang nang na song du 'byung ba yin pas na ngan song ba'o //
translated: Or, it is a miserable realm because it is the origin of the miserable realms.

original: log par lta ba ni phyin ci log gi shes pa'o //
analyzed: log par lta ba ni phyin ci log gi shes pa'o //
translated: Wrong view is distorted knowledge.

original: gang la shes pa yod pa de na gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi yang yod la /
analyzed: gang la shes pa yod pa de na gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi yang yod la /
translated: Where there is knowledge, there are also the four non-material aggregates.

original: de la rten gzugs kyi phung po yang gdon mi za bar yod do //
analyzed: de la rten gzugs kyi phung po yang gdon mi za bar yod do //
translated: The body, which is the support of the mind, is also necessarily present.

original: sems can ni de tsam du zad pas de'i 'bras bu ngan song gi 'gro ba de yin no zhes bya bar shes par byas nas de la srid pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems can ni de tsam du zad pas de'i 'bras bu ngan song gi 'gro ba de yin no zhes bya bar shes par byas nas de la srid pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since sentient beings are limited to that, one should understand that the result of that is the miserable realms.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med par yang med do zhes de skad du smra bas yang dag pa'i lta ba bsal nas med par lta ba la brten pa'i phyir log par lta @138b ba kho na la yang dag par brten par 'gyur ro
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med par yang med do zhes de skad du smra bas yang dag pa'i lta ba bsal nas med par lta ba la brten pa'i phyir log par lta @138b ba kho na la yang dag par brten par 'gyur ro
translated: Having rejected the correct view that nirvana is neither a thing nor a non-thing, one would rely on the wrong view that it is nonexistent.

original: zhes de dgag pa'i phyir med pa dang / yod pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gsum char gyi mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes de dgag pa'i phyir med pa dang / yod pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gsum char gyi mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa yin te /
translated: In order to refute that, the characteristics of all three‚Äînonexistent, existent, and nirvana‚Äîare briefly taught.

original: 'di las bde 'gro rgyu mthun par 'gyur zhing 'byung bar 'gyur bas 'bras bu bde 'gro can yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di las bde 'gro rgyu mthun par 'gyur zhing 'byung bar 'gyur bas 'bras bu bde 'gro can yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since a happy rebirth is in accordance with and arises from that, it is said to have the result of a happy rebirth.

original: yang dag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i lta ba ni blo gros dang 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i lta ba ni blo gros dang 'dod pa yin te /
translated: The correct, nonerroneous view is the intellect and desire.

original: de yang kho bo cag la tha snyad du yod na ji ltar de bsal ba yin /
analyzed: de yang kho bo cag la tha snyad du yod na ji ltar de bsal ba yin /
translated: Moreover, if something exists conventionally for us, how can it be refuted?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa yang thar pa 'ching ba dang bral ba yin la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa yang thar pa 'ching ba dang bral ba yin la /
translated: Nirvana is liberation, freedom from bondage.

original: de yang don 'ga' yang ma yin na de bzhin du brjod pa la nyes pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de yang don 'ga' yang ma yin na de bzhin du brjod pa la nyes pa ci zhig yod /
translated: Moreover, if it is not any kind of object, what fault is there in saying that it is like that?

original: mya ngan 'das pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Nirvana is twofold:

original: phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang cig shos so //
analyzed: phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang cig shos so //
translated: with a remainder of the aggregates and without a remainder of the aggregates.

original: re zhig phung po'i lhag ma med pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu mi srid do //
analyzed: re zhig phung po'i lhag ma med pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu mi srid do //
translated: To begin with, in the case of nirvana without a remainder of the aggregates, conceptualization of entities and so on is utterly impossible.

original: phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa la yang med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩshes pas med dang yod shi'i phyir ;
analyzed: phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa la yang med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir / shes pas med dang yod shi'i phyir ;
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is also impossible in the case of nirvana with a remainder of the aggregates, he says:

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Because of the nonexistence and existence of consciousness, etc.

original: shes pa ni 'dir bsgoms pa'i rab kyi mtha' las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs ma lus par bsal ba nyams su myong ba'i rnam par zhugs pa don phyin ci ma log par dmigs pa yin par bshad do //
analyzed: shes pa ni 'dir bsgoms pa'i rab kyi mtha' las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs ma lus par bsal ba nyams su myong ba'i rnam par zhugs pa don phyin ci ma log par dmigs pa yin par bshad do //
translated: Consciousness is explained as the object that is the nonerroneous referent object of the experience that arises from the culmination of meditation, which has completely eliminated the entire group of conceptual thoughts.

original: med pa dang yod par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa dang yod par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the pacification of the views of existence and nonexistence.

original: bsrung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsod nams dang gzhan la bya ste /
analyzed: bsrung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsod nams dang gzhan la bya ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúprotection‚Äù is used for both merit and others.

original: bsod nams dang gzhan bsrung bas de'i phyir bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bsod nams brjod do //
analyzed: bsod nams dang gzhan bsrung bas de'i phyir bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bsod nams brjod do //
translated: The term ‚Äúprotection‚Äù refers to merit because it protects merit and others.

original: gsod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba ni bsod nams bsrung ba thung zhing mi snang bar byed pas na sdig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba ni bsod nams bsrung ba thung zhing mi snang bar byed pas na sdig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The action that has the characteristic of killing and so on is called ‚Äúevil‚Äù because it destroys and obscures the protection of merit.

original: 'das pa ni rgal ba ste /
analyzed: 'das pa ni rgal ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúGone beyond‚Äù is crossed over.

original: sdig pa dang bsod nams dang las 'das pa de yis rgyu med pa'i phyir ngan 'gro dang bde 'gro las 'das pa zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: sdig pa dang bsod nams dang las 'das pa de yis rgyu med pa'i phyir ngan 'gro dang bde 'gro las 'das pa zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin no //
translated: Since that karma transcending virtue and sin has no cause, it is said to transcend evil destinies and happy destinies.

original: de lta bu de ni thar pa yin par dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad do //
analyzed: de lta bu de ni thar pa yin par dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad do //
translated: The wise have explained that such a state is liberation.

original: de ltar thar pa ni ngan 'gro dang bde 'gro las 'das pa yin par bshad la /
analyzed: de ltar thar pa ni ngan 'gro dang bde 'gro las 'das pa yin par bshad la /
translated: Thus, liberation is explained as transcending evil destinies and happy destinies.

original: 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin na ji ltar dngos po la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin na ji ltar dngos po la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin par 'gyur /
translated: But since the meaning of transcending does not exist in the least, how could it be the nature of things and so on?

original: gzhan la ltos te yang med par brjod par bya ba ma yin @139a * //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos te yang med par brjod par bya ba ma yin @139a * //
translated: It is not to be said that it does not exist in dependence on another,

original: te ; yang dag par na de yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //üîΩda ni / skye ba rgyu dang bcas mthong bas //
analyzed: te ; yang dag par na de yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro // da ni / skye ba rgyu dang bcas mthong bas //
translated: because that also is not established in reality.üîΩNow, in order to demonstrate that the views of annihilation and permanence are impossible, he says:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas chad pa dang rtag par lta ba mi srid par ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas chad pa dang rtag par lta ba mi srid par ston te /
translated: Since arising is seen to have a cause,

original: skye ba ni 'byung ba'o //üîΩ'gro bas na rgyu'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni 'byung ba'o // 'gro bas na rgyu'o //
translated: Arising is occurrence.üîΩGoing is a cause.

original: rgyu ni 'gro bas te /
analyzed: rgyu ni 'gro bas te /
translated: A cause is going.

original: 'bras bu la 'gro zhing sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'bras bu la 'gro zhing sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúgoing to the effect‚Äù is ‚Äúto accomplish.‚Äù

original: rgyu dang bcas par 'jug pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang bcas par 'jug pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúwith cause‚Äù because it operates with a cause.

original: mthong ba rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba rtogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Seeing‚Äù is ‚Äúrealization.‚Äù

original: 'gog pa ni nye bar zhi ba ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa ni nye bar zhi ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú Cessation‚Äù is ‚Äúpeace.‚Äù

original: sngar bshad pa /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa /
translated: This was explained earlier.

original: ngar 'dzin yod na yang las te //
analyzed: ngar 'dzin yod na yang las te //
translated: When there is the view of the transitory collection, there is karma.

original: de las yang ni skye ba yin //
analyzed: de las yang ni skye ba yin //
translated: From that, there is birth.

original: zhes bya ba des ni skye ba dang rgyu dang bcas pa bshad do //üîΩde ni rang gzhan gnyi ga dang // zhes bya ba dang / ngar 'dzin pa ni zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: zhes bya ba des ni skye ba dang rgyu dang bcas pa bshad do // de ni rang gzhan gnyi ga dang // zhes bya ba dang / ngar 'dzin pa ni zad par 'gyur //
translated: This explains birth and its cause.üîΩ‚Äú When there is no view of the transitory collection, there is no karma.

original: de nas las dang skye ba yang //
analyzed: de nas las dang skye ba yang //
translated: Then, there is neither karma nor birth.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba des ni 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba des ni 'gog pa'o //
translated: This explains cessation.

original: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis skye ba rgyu dang bcas pa de kun rdzob pa yin gyi /üîΩyang dag pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sngar skyes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston par byed de /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis skye ba rgyu dang bcas pa de kun rdzob pa yin gyi / yang dag pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sngar skyes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston par byed de /
translated: This verse shows that birth and its cause are conventional, not ultimate.üîΩ‚Äú Previously arisen‚Äù and so on show that.

original: 'bras bu bas sngar skyes shing byung ba la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu bas sngar skyes shing byung ba la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which arises earlier than the effect is called ‚Äúpreviously arisen‚Äù and ‚Äúpreviously occurred.‚Äù

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni dus mnyam du skyes pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni dus mnyam du skyes pa'o //
translated: Co-arisen means arisen simultaneously.

original: rgyu min zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma yin pa ste de nyid du rgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu min zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma yin pa ste de nyid du rgyu med pa'o //
translated: Non-cause means not a cause, i.e., without a cause.

original: don du zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
analyzed: don du zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
translated: In reality means in the ultimate sense.

original: don ni rigs pas bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab phyin ci ma log par don 'dzin pa la bya ste /
analyzed: don ni rigs pas bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab phyin ci ma log par don 'dzin pa la bya ste /
translated: The meaning is that wisdom which arises from the investigation of reason is the unmistaken apprehension of the meaning.

original: de la 'jug pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the means of entry into that.

original: des rgyu ma yin pa nyid du dpyad na rnam pa gnyi ga la yang rgyu med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: des rgyu ma yin pa nyid du dpyad na rnam pa gnyi ga la yang rgyu med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: When it is investigated as to whether it is a non-cause, in both cases there is no cause.

original: rgyu ma yin pa nyid ni 'bras bu bas sngar skyes pa'i gnas skabs kyi rgyu can yin no //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa nyid ni 'bras bu bas sngar skyes pa'i gnas skabs kyi rgyu can yin no //
translated: The non-cause is that which is the cause of the state prior to the effect.

original: 'bras bu byung ba yin na de'i rten skyed par byed pa rgyu yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu byung ba yin na de'i rten skyed par byed pa rgyu yin la /
translated: If the effect has arisen, the cause is the producer of its support.

original: de med na go ji ltar rgyu yin /
analyzed: de med na go ji ltar rgyu yin /
translated: If it does not exist, how can it be a cause?

original: lhan cig byung ba yang skyed par byed pa ma yin pas rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig byung ba yang skyed par byed pa ma yin pas rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Co-arisen is not a cause because it is not a producer.

original: da ltar 'byung na nges pa med pa'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar 'byung na nges pa med pa'i yang phyir ro //
translated: If it were present, there would be no certainty.

original: don 'di ni 'di lta bur grags pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don 'di ni 'di lta bur grags pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that this meaning is not renowned in this way, he says:

original: btags dang yang dag nyid du na ;üîΩ/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: btags dang yang dag nyid du na ; / zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In terms of designation and reality,

original: btags pa ni 'dogs pa ste tha snyad do //
analyzed: btags pa ni 'dogs pa ste tha snyad do //
translated: Designation is imputation, i.e., convention.

original: grags pa ni rab tu grags pa ste tha snyad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: grags pa ni rab tu grags pa ste tha snyad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Renown is well known, i.e., without convention.

original: yang dag pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas yang dag pa nyid du skye ba ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas yang dag pa nyid du skye ba ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: In terms of reality, arising in reality is origination.

original: de yang rab tu ma grags pa'i @139b phyir te ;
analyzed: de yang rab tu ma grags pa'i @139b phyir te ;
translated: And that is not well known.

original: 'di ni rang gzhan gnyi ga dang zhes bya ba der skye ba med pa yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gzhan gnyi ga dang zhes bya ba der skye ba med pa yang bstan zin to //
translated: This is also taught in the statement, ‚Äúin terms of both self and other.‚Äù

original: de ltar yang dag pa nyid du skye ba bkag pa byas pa dang / gang la la 'o na rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam yang bkag go zhes zer ba de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang dag pa nyid du skye ba bkag pa byas pa dang / gang la la 'o na rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam yang bkag go zhes zer ba de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: Thus, having refuted arising in reality, some say, ‚ÄúIn that case, this mere conditionality is also refuted.‚ÄùüîΩTo that, we reply:

original: rkyen nyid 'di ba tsam ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rkyen nyid 'di ba tsam ni 'di lta ste /
translated: This mere conditionality is as follows:

original: 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúWhen this exists, that comes to be.‚Äù

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o //
translated: ‚Äú This‚Äù refers to the cause.

original: yod pas na zhes bya ba ni yod na'o //
analyzed: yod pas na zhes bya ba ni yod na'o //
translated: ‚Äú Exists‚Äù means ‚Äúwhen it exists.‚Äù

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the effect.

original: 'di ji lta bu zhig ce na dper na ring po yod na thung du bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ji lta bu zhig ce na dper na ring po yod na thung du bzhin no //
translated: What is it like? For example, when the long exists, the short exists.

original: don de nyid dpe gzhan gyis sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: don de nyid dpe gzhan gyis sgrub par byed de /
translated: The same point is established by another example.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rgyu'o //
translated: ‚Äú This‚Äù refers to the cause.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the effect.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di mjug thogs pa ni sun 'byin te /üîΩsngar tha snyad du ring po la ltos nas thung dur bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid yang dag par na ring po med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'di mjug thogs pa ni sun 'byin te / sngar tha snyad du ring po la ltos nas thung dur bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid yang dag par na ring po med pa'i phyir la /
translated: The refutation is immediate.üîΩPreviously, conventionally, in dependence on the long, the short was explained.

original: thung ngu'i rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir de la ltos pa can gyi ring po yang med do //
analyzed: thung ngu'i rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir de la ltos pa can gyi ring po yang med do //
translated: But in reality, because the long does not exist, and because the short has no intrinsic reality, the long that depends on it does not exist.

original: 'on te thung ngu'i ming med kyang ming can ni yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te thung ngu'i ming med kyang ming can ni yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But even if the short does not exist, the bearer of the name of short certainly exists.

original: de yang rung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rung ba ma yin te /
translated: That is not tenable.

original: yang dag par na skye ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yang dag par na skye ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: because in reality there is no arising.

original: gnyi ga yang mi srid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang mi srid do //
translated: Both are impossible.

original: de bzhin du 'di skyes pas na 'di skye ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di skyes pas na 'di skye ste /

analyzed: yang na nyes pa gzhan 'di yang yod do zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin te /

original: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba'i don du bya'o //
analyzed: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba'i don du bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúor else‚Äù should be supplied.

original: so so rang yod kyang rung med kyang rung phan tshun bsten pa yang skyon yin par ni mjug thogs nas 'byung bas ston to ;üîΩ/ gal te nyes pa der 'gyur du 'ong zhes te /
analyzed: so so rang yod kyang rung med kyang rung phan tshun bsten pa yang skyon yin par ni mjug thogs nas 'byung bas ston to ; / gal te nyes pa der 'gyur du 'ong zhes te /
translated: Whether or not they exist individually, mutual dependence is a fault.

original: gang na 'byung ba gcig yod pa de na lhag ma rnams yod do zhes bya bar khas len na gcig tu gnas pa nyid la gzhan du gyur pa mi 'thad pas de lta na gcig tu gnas pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang na 'byung ba gcig yod pa de na lhag ma rnams yod do zhes bya bar khas len na gcig tu gnas pa nyid la gzhan du gyur pa mi 'thad pas de lta na gcig tu gnas pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you accept that when one primary element exists, the others also exist, then it is untenable that they transform into something else while remaining the same. Thus, you accept that they remain the same.üîΩWhat is the fault of that?

original: gyur du zad mod nyes pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: gyur du zad mod nyes pa ci yod ce na /
translated: The verse states:

original: @146b ma 'dres pa rnams gcig gnas med //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: @146b ma 'dres pa rnams gcig gnas med // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: 'dres pa rnams ni so so logs shig gi rang gi ngo bo nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dres pa rnams ni so so logs shig gi rang gi ngo bo nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: If they are mixed, they do not remain the same.üîΩIf they are not mixed, they do not remain the same.

original: sbrang rtsi dang mar dang 'o ma dang chu bzhin no //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi dang mar dang 'o ma dang chu bzhin no //
translated: like honey, butter, milk, and water.üîΩThe characteristics of the elements are also not tenable, as is stated immediately after:

original: 'byung ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang rung ba ma yin no zhes mjug thogs nas 'byung bas ston te shas che ba ni lhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang rung ba ma yin no zhes mjug thogs nas 'byung bas ston te shas che ba ni lhag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe predominance of one element over another is not tenable.‚Äù

original: 'o na mtshan nyid ji ltar bka' stsal zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mtshan nyid ji ltar bka' stsal zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how did the Buddha teach the characteristics of the elements?

original: mtshan nyid dag ni kun rdzob bshad //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dag ni kun rdzob bshad // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The characteristics are said to be conventional.üîΩThe characteristics are said to be conventional.

original: kun rdzob tu tha snyad du yin la /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu tha snyad du yin la /
translated: They are conventional in the sense of being nominal.

original: 'di ni de kho na nyid bsam pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ni de kho na nyid bsam pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
translated: Since this is a consideration of reality, there is no fault.

original: 'byung ba chen po med par bstan pa'i tshul te /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po med par bstan pa'i tshul te /
translated: This is the method of teaching the nonexistence of the elements.

original: thabs bshad pa gang yin pa'i thabs de nyid kha dog la sogs pa'i yang yin no //
analyzed: thabs bshad pa gang yin pa'i thabs de nyid kha dog la sogs pa'i yang yin no //
translated: The method that was explained for the elements is also the method for color and so on.

original: 'byung ba dgag pa 'das ma thag pas brten pa yang bkag zin pa nyid yin mod kyi gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir smos par zad de /
analyzed: 'byung ba dgag pa 'das ma thag pas brten pa yang bkag zin pa nyid yin mod kyi gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir smos par zad de /
translated: Although the refutation of the supported was already completed by the refutation of the elements, it is mentioned here for the sake of clarity.

original: kha dog ni gzugs so //
analyzed: kha dog ni gzugs so //
translated: Color is form.

original: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /

original: 'di dag kyang 'dres par 'gyur bar 'dod do //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang 'dres par 'gyur bar 'dod do //
translated: We also believe that they are mixed.

original: phra rab rdul ni rdzas brgyad do //
analyzed: phra rab rdul ni rdzas brgyad do //
translated: The subtle particle is eight substances.

original: zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de lta bas na de dag kyang 'byung ba bzhin med par sgrub pa la rigs pa ni de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na de dag kyang 'byung ba bzhin med par sgrub pa la rigs pa ni de nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, this very argument proves that they do not exist like the elements.

original: de ltar 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams yod pa ma yin par bstan nas /üîΩda ni mig ces bya ba nas bzung ste /üîΩming dang ming can zhes bya ba'i bar spyir gzugs can ma yin pa'i don rnams la yang tshul ni 'di nyid yin no zhes bya bar de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
analyzed: de ltar 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams yod pa ma yin par bstan nas / da ni mig ces bya ba nas bzung ste / ming dang ming can zhes bya ba'i bar spyir gzugs can ma yin pa'i don rnams la yang tshul ni 'di nyid yin no zhes bya bar de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
translated: Thus, having demonstrated that the elements and the derivative forms do not exist,üîΩnow, the word ‚Äúso‚Äù indicates that the method is the same for all the things that are not form, beginning with the eye and ending with name and the bearer of the name.

original: mig gis mtshon pa rna ba la sogs pa dang / gzugs kyis mtshon pa sgra la sogs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pas mtshon pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: mig gis mtshon pa rna ba la sogs pa dang / gzugs kyis mtshon pa sgra la sogs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pas mtshon pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la yang ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúso‚Äù indicates that the method is the same for the ear, etc., illustrated by the eye, for sound, etc., illustrated by form, and for the ear-consciousness, etc., illustrated by eye-consciousness.

original: yang na gzugs zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyi rnam grangs su byas nas mig gi ngo bo nyid kyi rna ba la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid la brten pa dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la brten nas so //
analyzed: yang na gzugs zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid kyi rnam grangs su byas nas mig gi ngo bo nyid kyi rna ba la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid la brten pa dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la brten nas so //
translated: Similarly, the essence of consciousness is the ear consciousness, etc., and so on, up to the essence of consciousness is based on the essence of the eye consciousness, etc.

original: mig la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams ngo bo nyid yin pa ni de dag kyang bsags pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams ngo bo nyid yin pa ni de dag kyang bsags pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The forms of the eye, etc., are essences because they are the essence of a collection.

original: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang tshogs pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra @147a * //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang tshogs pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra @147a * //
translated: Consciousness, etc., are similar to that, because they arise as the essence of a collection.

original: bar bsam par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bar bsam par bya ba yin no //
translated: They should be understood in that way.

original: ma rig pa yang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag dang 'dra ba yin pas de dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa yang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag dang 'dra ba yin pas de dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: Ignorance is similar to the root and secondary afflictions, so it is similar to that.

original: rnam par shes pa smos pas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smos pas /
translated: By mentioning consciousness,

original: sems las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ma rig pa yang smos pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sems las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ma rig pa yang smos pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Why is ignorance mentioned, since it is a mental factor?

original: yang ci ste smos she na /
analyzed: yang ci ste smos she na /
translated: Why is it mentioned?

original: de ni bden na 'on kyang de ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir yang smos te /
analyzed: de ni bden na 'on kyang de ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir yang smos te /
translated: This is true, but it is mentioned because it is the principal cause.

original: 'di ltar de'i stobs kyis ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'jug la 'khor ba yang de las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i stobs kyis ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'jug la 'khor ba yang de las 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, the other afflictions and secondary afflictions are activated by its power, and cyclic existence originates from it.

original: las gnyis smos pa'i phyir 'di gang gis yin par bzung ngo //
analyzed: las gnyis smos pa'i phyir 'di gang gis yin par bzung ngo //
translated: Since two kinds of action are mentioned, what is it that is referred to by the term action?

original: las zhes bya ba'am bya ba phung po la ma gtogs pa don gyi khyad par gzhan du brjod pa'am dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: las zhes bya ba'am bya ba phung po la ma gtogs pa don gyi khyad par gzhan du brjod pa'am dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The term action does not refer to a real entity apart from the aggregates, nor is it a designation or object of reference.

original: rgyu ma rig pa la sogs pa snga ma la brten nas phung po'i tshogs phyi ma phyi ma la las zhes bya bar zad do //
analyzed: rgyu ma rig pa la sogs pa snga ma la brten nas phung po'i tshogs phyi ma phyi ma la las zhes bya bar zad do //
translated: The term action refers to the aggregates in the future, which are conditioned by the previous causes of ignorance, etc.

original: ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa'i rgyu can gyi phung po 'byung ba tshogs pa'i ngo bo ni skye ba'o ;
analyzed: ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa'i rgyu can gyi phung po 'byung ba tshogs pa'i ngo bo ni skye ba'o ;
translated: The origination of the aggregates conditioned by ignorance, craving, and grasping is birth.

original: / ma rig pa dang las dang skye ba ni ma rig pa dang las dang skye ba rnams te de rnams la'o //
analyzed: / ma rig pa dang las dang skye ba ni ma rig pa dang las dang skye ba rnams te de rnams la'o //
translated: Ignorance, action, and birth are ignorance, action, and birth.

original: byed pas na rang dbang can gyi byed pa ni byed pa po ste phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: byed pas na rang dbang can gyi byed pa ni byed pa po ste phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: The agent is one who acts independently, and he has the nature of the five aggregates.

original: de'i bya bas khyab pa ni las te 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa yin no //üîΩyang na 'ga' yang mi 'dod pa dug 'thung ba'am /
analyzed: de'i bya bas khyab pa ni las te 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa yin no // yang na 'ga' yang mi 'dod pa dug 'thung ba'am /
translated: The object is pervaded by his action, and it is either desired or not desired.üîΩOr, it is not desired by anyone, like drinking poison or falling into an abyss.

original: g-yang sar mchod pa med pas gang gis mi 'dod pa de res 'ga' de nyid kyi 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: g-yang sar mchod pa med pas gang gis mi 'dod pa de res 'ga' de nyid kyi 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: What is not desired by anyone is sometimes desired by that very person,

original: de yang phung po 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang phung po 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of an aggregation of aggregates.

original: de dag nyid tshogs pa'i stobs kyis de dang der skye ba na zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob po //
analyzed: de dag nyid tshogs pa'i stobs kyis de dang der skye ba na zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob po //
translated: By the power of their mere aggregation, they obtain the name ‚Äúbirth‚Äù in that and that state.

original: grangs ni gcig la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: grangs ni gcig la sogs pa ste //
translated: Number is one, etc.

original: de yang bgrang bar bya ba las ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: de yang bgrang bar bya ba las ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: And that is not separate from what is to be counted.

original: rdzas dang rdzas gzhan du sbyor ba ni ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rdzas dang rdzas gzhan du sbyor ba ni ldan pa ste /
translated: Conjunction is the connection of substance with another substance.

original: de yang de las gzhan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang de las gzhan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, they are not other than that.

original: 'on te bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid yin na yang de'i tshe bsam gtan ni sems rtse gcig pa'i tshogs kyi ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: 'on te bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid yin na yang de'i tshe bsam gtan ni sems rtse gcig pa'i tshogs kyi ngo bo yin no //
translated: If they are the characteristics of concentration, then concentration is the nature of the collection of one-pointed minds.

original: rgyu ni phyi'i sa bon no //
analyzed: rgyu ni phyi'i sa bon no //
translated: The cause is the external seed.

original: 'bras bu ni de las skyes pa 'bru la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de las skyes pa 'bru la sogs pa'o //
translated: The result is the grain, etc. that is produced from that.

original: dus ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo gsum mo //
analyzed: dus ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo gsum mo //
translated: Time is the three natures of the past, etc.

original: de dag kyang phung po las ma gtogs pa gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang phung po las ma gtogs pa gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, they are not other than the aggregates.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang // nges par 'byung bcas gzhir bcas pa //üîΩzhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang // nges par 'byung bcas gzhir bcas pa // zhes bshad pas so //
translated: Those are the basis of time, basis of discourse, and basis of renunciation.

original: ring po bas thung @147b ba ni thung ngu'o //
analyzed: ring po bas thung @147b ba ni thung ngu'o //

original: de bas srid du lhag pa ni ring ba'o //
analyzed: de bas srid du lhag pa ni ring ba'o //

original: stsogs zhes smos pa ni gru bzhi dang zlum po la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: stsogs zhes smos pa ni gru bzhi dang zlum po la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes square, round, and so on.

analyzed: gang dag la thung du dang ring po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming yod pa de dag ni de dag ces bya'o //
translated: Those that have names such as short and long are called those.

original: de dag thams cad kyang 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pas tshul ni de nyid yin te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pas tshul ni de nyid yin te /
translated: Since all of them are the nature of the aggregates, their mode is just that.

original: bdag bzhin du brdzun pa'i chos yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag bzhin du brdzun pa'i chos yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: de ltar rgyas par brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar rgyas par brjod nas /
translated: Having explained in detail,

analyzed: yang ming dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor bsdu ba mdzad de ming zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ming gi rnam grangs yin no //

original: 'di la ming du btags pa yod pas na ming can te de dag la'o //
analyzed: 'di la ming du btags pa yod pas na ming can te de dag la'o //
translated: Since they exist as things designated by name, they are named, i.e., they are those.

original: ji ltar 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir brtags na bdag bzhin du brdzun te bden pa ma yin pa ltar 'di dag kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir brtags na bdag bzhin du brdzun te bden pa ma yin pa ltar 'di dag kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Just as the elements and the element derivatives are false, like the self, when analyzed, because they are the nature of the aggregation, the meaning is that these are also like that.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de nas sa la sogs pa bshad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de nas sa la sogs pa bshad pa ma yin nam /
translated: But didn‚Äôt the Lord explain earth, etc. in this and that context?

original: de ji ltar de skad ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar de skad ces bya zhe na /

original: de ni tha snyad du gsungs kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni tha snyad du gsungs kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //

original: 'di ltar yang dag par bsgoms pa'i mthar phyin pa las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa de 'gag par 'gyur te mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag par bsgoms pa'i mthar phyin pa las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa de 'gag par 'gyur te mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rgyas par ston te bye brag tu shes pas na rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩ'di ni 'di na'o //
analyzed: rgyas par ston te bye brag tu shes pas na rnam par shes pa'o // 'di ni 'di na'o //

original: pha bi ni pha bi na'o zhes bya bar bstan par mi nus pas na bstan du med do //
analyzed: pha bi ni pha bi na'o zhes bya bar bstan par mi nus pas na bstan du med do //
translated: It cannot be indicated as being here or there, thus it is non-indicative.

original: gzhi mtha' yas pa la dmigs pas na mtha' yas pa ste /
analyzed: gzhi mtha' yas pa la dmigs pas na mtha' yas pa ste /
translated: It is infinite because it is focused on infinite bases.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is the wisdom of omniscience endowed with infinite qualities.

original: de'i stobs kyis thams cad rab tu 'jug ste /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis thams cad rab tu 'jug ste /
translated: Everything functions by its power.

original: de bas na kun du chos thams cad la bdag po dang dbang sgyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na kun du chos thams cad la bdag po dang dbang sgyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the sovereign and controller of all phenomena.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par shes pa de la ni gnas thod par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par shes pa de la ni gnas thod par 'gyur ba ma yin te /

original: gnas skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //

original: re re la brten nas gcig gi tshig tu byas te bstan du med pa la de dag gi gnas med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: re re la brten nas gcig gi tshig tu byas te bstan du med pa la de dag gi gnas med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Based on each one, the term ‚Äúone‚Äù is used. It is said that ‚Äúthey do not exist in the absence of a basis‚Äù for the non-existent.

original: 'o na de dag lta med du zad /
analyzed: 'o na de dag lta med du zad /
translated: If that is so, then they are simply non-existent.

original: gzhan dag yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan dag yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //

original: gang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ram /
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ram /
translated: The term ‚Äúthat‚Äù indicates a reason or a fact.

original: gang 'di zhes bya bar thams cad kyi khyad par yin te /
analyzed: gang 'di zhes bya bar thams cad kyi khyad par yin te /
translated: The term ‚Äúthis‚Äù is a qualifier that applies to everything.

original: sngon so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs kyi rnam par shes pa las byung zhing skyes pa de thams cad @148a * //
analyzed: sngon so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs kyi rnam par shes pa las byung zhing skyes pa de thams cad @148a * //
translated: All of the consciousnesses that arise and occur in the state of being an ordinary being

original: ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pas brtags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pas brtags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: yod pa ma yin pa las brtags pa de shes pa'i phyir te 'di la bden pa gang yin zhes de ltar brtags na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs kyi 'og rol tu rnam par shesüîΩpa kho nar 'gag par 'gyur zhing de la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
